detail: Glenn and Garry Vian are brothers.
Jonathan Rees is a former brother-in-law to Glenn and Garry Vian.
Jonathan Rees is a former brother-in-law to Glenn and Garry Vian.
Alastair Morgan is the brother of Daniel Morgan.
Daniel Morgan and Jonathan Rees were business partners in their investigation agency, Southern Investigations.
Daniel Morgan and Jonathan Rees were business partners in their investigation agency, Southern Investigations.
Daniel Morgan and Jonathan Rees were business partners in their investigation agency, Southern Investigations.
Sid Fillery was one of the detectives assigned to the first investigation into Daniel Morgan's murder. Fillery later took Morgan's place in the private investigations agency, Southern Investigations.
Sid Fillery and Jonathan Rees were close friends, drinking partners, and business partners.
After Daniel Morgan was murdered, Sid Fillery took his place in the private investigations agency, Southern Investigations.
Dave Cook was the detective who ran the 4th and 5th investigations into Daniel Morgan's murder.
Daniel Morgan was having an affair with Margaret Harrison around the time of his death.
Jonathan Rees was having an affair with Margaret Harrison around the time of Daniel Morgan's murder. Rees later divorced his wife and married Harrison.
Alex Marunchak was the crime editor of the News of the World.
News of the World was one of the biggest clients of Southern Investigations.
Jill Dando was a presenter on TV show Crimewatch in the 1990s.
Jacqui Hames was a presenter on TV show Crimewatch in the 1990s and 2000s.
Dave Cook appeared on Crimewatch to make an appeal for information.
Dave Cook and Jacqui Hames were married.
Rebekah Brooks is a protégé of Rupert Murdoch. She has worked for various Murdoch-owned newspapers, and is now CEO of Murdoch's subsidiary, News UK.
Rebekah Brooks was the editor of the News of the World from 2000 - 2003.
